title: Into the Wild Wood: Erotic Feminist Fairy Tales
description: A collection of six feminist fairy tales with an erotic lesbian twist. From retellings of tradition tales, to an original story based on traditional Irish and Welsh mythology and fairy lore, this collection aims to celebrate love between women, and take a wry poke at traditional fairy tale themes and motifs. Something for the head and for the heart.The Fairest of Them All (based on 'Snow White')Jorinda and the Fairy (based on 'Jorinda and Jorindel' from Grimm)The Snowmaiden (based on a Russian folk tale of the same name)Red Moon Rising (based on 'Red Riding Hood')Fox Spirit (based on 'On a Contest Between Women of Extraordinary Strength', a Japanese kitsune tale.)The Changeling (original story inspired by Welsh and Irish mythology and fairy lore)
author: Annik Hill
